amendment.description: To increase the quantity of solar photovoltaic electricity by providing rebates for the purchase and installation of an additional 10,000,000 photovoltaic systems by 2025.

vote.text: Amendment SA 23, under the order of 1/27/2015, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 58. Record Vote Number: 33.

action.text: Amendment SA 23 proposed by Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S518-520; text: CR S518) To increase the quantity of solar photovoltaic electricity by providing rebates for the purchase and installation of an additional 10,000,000 photovoltaic systems by 2025.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 23, under the order of 1/27/2015, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 58. Record Vote Number: 33.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 23, under the order of 1/27/2015, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 58. Record Vote Number: 33.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 23 proposed by Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 2.
